companyDescription: Wonolo is a staffing platform that connects businesses with on-demand workers for warehouse, logistics, and retail jobs.
description: Spearheaded the migration of the React Native app from JavaScript to TypeScript
Optimized CI/CD pipelines with BuildKite and GitHub Actions, cutting deployment times by 30%
Established automated testing workflows (Jest, React Testing Library)
Acted as a technical lead, mentoring engineers and guiding architecture decisions
